div.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, Vol. XVII, No. 293, Dec. 22, 1906ST. STANISLAUS SCHOOL IN FLAMES

body.p: The school and other property of societies was destroyed by fire. Fifty nuns escaped with their lives. Four thousand children were deprived of education. This structure was built in the year of 1889.
The building was 213 feet long and 80 feet wide. There were twelve classrooms on each floor. The general financial loss was estimated at $150,000.
